remarks: Scalar multiplication for the dual of a vector space.  (Contributed by NM, 19-Oct-2014.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 22-Sep-2015.)
statement:
ldualsmul.f $e |- F = ( Scalar ` W ) $.
ldualsmul.k $e |- K = ( Base ` F ) $.
ldualsmul.t $e |- .x. = ( .r ` F ) $.
ldualsmul.d $e |- D = ( LDual ` W ) $.
ldualsmul.r $e |- R = ( Scalar ` D ) $.
ldualsmul.m $e |- .xb = ( .r ` R ) $.
ldualsmul.w $e |- ( ph -> W e. V ) $.
ldualsmul.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. K ) $.
ldualsmul.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. K ) $.
ldualsmul $p |- ( ph -> ( X .xb Y ) = ( Y .x. X ) ) $.
